author: AceShowbiz.com
title: 'Gotham' 2.06 Preview: Bad Partner
text:
Comments Firely and Selina are partners in crime now and the GCPD declares a war against them. 
Viewers were introduced to new villain Firely in the latest episode of " Gotham ". Initially reluctantly helping her brothers, Bridgit Pike a.k.a. Firely (Michelle Veintimilla) soon enjoys the adrenaline rush that comes with the danger. She reunites with Selina Kyle, her old friend, and the two end up being partners in crime. It doesn't take a long time until the GCPD identifies them and declares a war against them. In a preview for next week's episode, as the hunt for the two begins, Gordon will come face to face with Selina. In "By Fire", after Bridgit Pike rejoins her brothers, a new spark of courage ignites within her, as she chooses to take control of her future. Meanwhile, Kringle and Nygma's relationship will take a new step and Penguin and Galavan continue to battle for control of Gotham City's underworld. The new episode will air Monday, October 26 at 8/7c on FOX.
